name: Emotion Puzzle
description:
Puzzle game where you combine emotional people and gain power ups. Your goal is to reach your birthday cake by making your way through garden where party is held.

Power Ups:
Bone: Distract the dog
Break: Smash bush fences
Build: Build bridges
Push: Push people around

Controls:
WASD - Move the player
ESC - Return to main menu
R - Restart current level
People with hats can be combined according to the Wheel Of Emotion. Walking against people takes the emotion and it can be used on people without emotions. Player can use Power Ups by hitting right objects.
